numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The NBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
3. The WNBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
4. I wonder why the only American-made sport has the lowest diversity percentage rate.
6. This situation shows that some Americans are still racist in some way.
7. I think that racism happens less in music.
9. The NBA and the WNBA have the highest diversity among sports.
